```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(viridis)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)

scale_colour_discrete = scale_colour_viridis_d()
scale_fill_discrete = scale_fill_viridis_d()

theme_set(theme_light() + theme(legend.position = "bottom"))
```

```{r data import, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE, include=FALSE}
data(rest_inspec)

rest_inspec %>% 
  janitor::clean_names()
```


Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart A: Distribution of Scores among Pending Grades

```{r}
rest_inspec %>% 
  filter(boro %in% c("BRONX", "MANHATTAN", "BROOKLYN", "QUEENS", "STATEN ISLAND"),
         grade %in%  c("P", "Z")) %>% 
  mutate(boro = fct_reorder(boro, score),
         grade = recode(grade, "P" = "Pending on re-opening after an initial inspection resulting in a closure", "Z" = "Pending")) %>% 
  plot_ly(x = ~boro, y = ~score, color = ~grade, type = "box") %>% 
  layout(boxmode = "group")
```

Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart B: Grades Among "Critical" Restaurants

```{r}
rest_inspec %>% 
  filter(critical_flag == "Critical") %>%  
  count(grade) %>% 
  mutate(grade = fct_reorder(grade, n)) %>% #to make bar chart in a particular order
  plot_ly(x = ~n, y = ~grade, color = ~grade, type = "bar") %>% 
  layout(xaxis = list(title = "Count"), yaxis = list(title = "Grade"))
```

### Chart C

```{r}
rest_inspec %>% 
  filter(boro == "BRONX" | cuisine_description %in% c("Pizza", "Pizza/Italian")) %>% 
  plot_ly(x = ~inspection_date, y = ~score, color = ~grade, type = "scatter")
```
